text: The 2019–20 Querétaro F.C. season is the 11th club's consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. The club this season will compete in the Apertura and Clausura tournaments as well as in the Copa MX. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
